p: All the 5-FU (-) mice survived throughout the duration of the experiment ( Table 2). In the 5-FU (+) mice, one mouse was euthanized and one was found dead in the control group, whereas no mouse death was observed in the RS- and oseltamivir-treated groups ( Table 2). These results indicate that RS could protect immunocompetent and immunocompromised mice from lethal IFV infection.
